page.title: 04H O U S I N G
page.content: The majority of houses are occupied by their owners, although several farms in the area belong to the Winnington estate. There are 3 Council Houses and 2 Old Persons' Bungalows for rent. Of the main employers in the area, C.N. Jones and J.W. Lane have no workers resident in the area and Stanford Court uses buses to transport the majority of employees to their work from local population centres. The tendency over the past few years has been to sell cottages as they become vacant. Prices and the need to renovate them have put them beyond the range of first time buyers. This year, The Old Mill was advertised at #95,000. School Cottages, which housed three families has now been sold as one dwelling.
